data.text: @Dragynwing @orion7710 @ScottGottliebMD @maarit81 @CDCgov Worse, my little virtue signalers. It’s in everything you encounter daily.

@notquitegonzo @Syfx18637973 @vet_dot @oltmannd @ScottGottliebMD @CDCgov Sorry it looked like you were replying to me, and I’m curious about study. Perhaps ppl misunderstand what it’s about. https://t.co/e80D8jX7GG

@jwitker @Syfx18637973 @vet_dot @oltmannd @ScottGottliebMD @CDCgov Can you say what you think it means when I state "sorry i don't want to engage this thread/person going back n forth w you, or arguing w ppl about covid"

& why you try to use my reply to a friend abt what he might find interesting as bait in your ongoing quest of whatever
@notquitegonzo @Syfx18637973 @vet_dot @oltmannd @ScottGottliebMD @CDCgov Thanks! Can you say what you think it means and/or how relevant to what’s being debated here?

@Syfx18637973 @jwitker @vet_dot @oltmannd @ScottGottliebMD @CDCgov hi! ty for thinking of me & caring about ppl even though so many are behaving wretchedly

sorry i don't want to engage this thread/person going back n forth w you, or arguing w ppl about covid. i did see this tweet that maybe you will be interested in tho? https://t.co/g64nSwlKva
@oltmannd @murchiston @vet_dot @CDCgov What has been observed thus far w/ O. https://t.co/bJswPIZITk
@oltmannd @murchiston @vet_dot @CDCgov CDC study I linked to was infections pre-Delta protecting vs. Delta. More pre-Delta refs: https://t.co/4mnrpZxSph
